title: FERENDy
description: Smart consumer platform that recommends products based on user preferences. Plans to integrate AR product previews and AI-driven matching algorithms for enhanced shopping experience.
longDescription:
FERENDy is an innovative consumer recommendation platform that leverages artificial intelligence to provide personalized product suggestions. The platform is designed to revolutionize online shopping by understanding user preferences and delivering highly relevant recommendations.

Currently in development, FERENDy will feature advanced AR product previews, allowing users to visualize products in their own environment before making a purchase. The AI-driven matching algorithms analyze user behavior, preferences, and contextual data to provide increasingly accurate recommendations over time.

This project showcases my expertise in consumer-facing applications, AI integration, and emerging technologies like augmented reality. It represents the future of e-commerce where technology enhances rather than complicates the shopping experience.
challenges: Integrating AR technology for product visualization
Creating intuitive user interfaces for complex features
results: Positive user feedback on interface design
